Interface yii\base\ViewContextInterface

Available since version2.0
Source Code
ViewContextInterface is the interface that should implemented by classes who want to support relative view names.

The method findViewFile() should be implemented to convert a relative view name into a file path.

Public Methods

Hide inherited methods

MethodDescriptionDefined By
findViewFile() Finds the view file corresponding to the specified relative view name. yii\base\ViewContextInterface

Method Details

findViewFile() method
string findViewFile( $view )
$view string A relative view name. The name does NOT start with a slash.
return string the view file path. Note that the file may not exist.

Finds the view file corresponding to the specified relative view name.
